name: Mutants First Night
description:
Mark is a mercenary hired by a mysterious client to steal samples of a vaccine from a laboratory located on an island. Once he get into the lab he realizes that all the scientists have been transformed into mutants and horrible monsters because they were in contact with an unknown material that was brought from hell by a demon.

[UPDATE]

Now enemies are more easy to kill and player hp is higher.

OBJECTIVES

-Collect 20 samples of the vaccine.
-Find the maintenance room and place the C4 bomb on a wall with a painted map.
-Find the code to unlock the door on the second floor.
-Avoid being hitting by mutants.

CONTROLS

W                              FORWARD 
S                                 BACKWARD   
A                                 LEFT 
D                                 RIGHT 
E                                  INTERACT 
C                                  CROUCH 
 R                                  RELOAD  
ESC                             PAUSE MENU 
LEFT CLICK           SHOT

You can play ths game on android devices:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Vanadial.MutantsFirstNight
